title: Search Advertising AdGroup
description: Search Advertising Ad Group is a logical collection or grouping of ads.

searchads:adgroupId.title: Ad Group Identifier
searchads:adgroupId.description: Ad Group ID on the search advertising platform.

searchads:campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
searchads:campaignId.description: Campaign ID for the Ad Group on the search advertising platform.

searchads:internalCampaignId.title: Internal Campaign Identifier
searchads:internalCampaignId.description: Internal Campaign ID for the Ad Group. This identifier determines uniqueness of campaign and ad group record.

searchads:searchEngineId.title: Search Engine Identifier
searchads:searchEngineId.description: The application-specified identifier used to identify the Search Advertising Platform Name.

searchads:adGroupStatus.title: Ad Group Status
searchads:adGroupStatus.description: Ad Group Status indicates if underlying ads are eligible to serve.

searchads:bidLevel.title: Bid Level
searchads:bidLevel.description:: What determines the bid for all ads belonging to this adgroup.
